name.text: 10.1.2.1 Addition and subtraction of complex numbers

questiontext.text:
Addition and subtraction of complex numbers

Let \(z\) and \(w\) be any two complex numbers where \(z=a+i b\) and \(w=c+i d\) then \[z+w=(a+c)+i(b+d),\] \[z-w=(a-c)+i(b-d).\] For example if \(z=2-3i\), \(w=-4+2i\) then \[z+w=\{2+(-4)\}+\{(-3)+2\}i =-2-i,\] \[z-w=\{2-(-4)\}+\{(-3)-2\}i =6-5i\]
